remarks: Associative law for (right vector space) scalar product of functionals. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-2014.)
statement:
lflass.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lflass.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lflass.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
lflass.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
lflass.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lflass.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lflass.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. K ) $.
lflass.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. K ) $.
lflass.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lflvsass $p |- ( ph -> ( G oF .x. ( V X. { ( X .x. Y ) } ) ) = ( ( G oF .x. ( V X. { X } ) ) oF .x. ( V X. { Y } ) ) ) $.
